casebody.data:
Phyllis V. PARSONS
v.
Donald Joe PARSONS, Jr., individually, and as Administrator of the Estate of Donald Joe Parsons No. 97P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 John M. Logsdon, Attorney at Law, North Wilkesboro, for Parsons, Phyllis V. John G. Vannoy, Jr., North Wilkesboro, Jay Vannoy, Daniel S. Johnson, Winston-Salem, Attorneys at Law, for Parsons, Donald Joe (Jr.) (Ind. & Adm.)

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 2nd of April 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
